meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting the skin.
meanings.sent1: The cutaneously sensitive area on my arm reacted to the slightest touch.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a cutaneously safe sunscreen for my sensitive skin.
meanings.sent3: The cutaneously challenged superhero's weakness was a sunburn.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as soft and smooth as a cutaneously soothing lotion.
meanings.sent5: The cutaneously red rash spread quickly across his face.

meanings.definition: Administered through or applied to the skin.
meanings.sent1: The cutaneously applied ointment helped soothe the irritation.
meanings.sent2: The cutaneously absorbed medication provided fast relief.
meanings.sent3: The cutaneously gifted masseuse had magic hands.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a cutaneously healing balm to his wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The cutaneously cooling gel calmed the sunburned skin.
